name: Aipom
flavorText:
Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.

previous.name: Jumpluff
previous.flavorText:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.

next.name: Sunkern
next.flavorText:
It may drop out of
the sky suddenly.
If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will
violently shake
its leaves.

pokemon.name: Aipom
pokemon.flavorText:
Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.

pokemon.name: Ambipom
pokemon.flavorText:
To eat, it deftly shucks nuts
with its two tails. It rarely uses
its arms now.
